item.title: BnCBF17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnCBF17 Gene Name: CBF-like protein CBF17 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Cold acclimation and BnCBF17-over-expression enhance photosynthetic performance and energy conversion efficiency during long-term growth of Brassica napus under elevated CO2 conditions.

item.title: DL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU7Hr1G106960 Gene Symbol: DL Gene Name: Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Although the DL mutant allele showed no expression changes in selected tissues by real-time PCR, we propose HORVU7Hr1G106960 as a candidate gene conferring the dwarf and liguleless phenotype in barley.
